statements: DELETE FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_location = 'Paris' AND designer_specialty = 'Haute Couture';
DELETE FROM designers WHERE designer_id = 1 AND designer_year_established < 2000
DELETE FROM collections WHERE collection_name = 'Winter Collection';
DELETE FROM collections WHERE collection_name = 'Summer Collection';
DELETE FROM designs WHERE designer_id = 2 AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM designer_collections WHERE designer_id = 1 AND collection_id = 1;
